page.title: 19GREEN SITE HOUSING, GRIMSBY
page.content: { Little land remains }in Grimsby for building.Plans were passed in 1981 to allow building on 1 of 3 meadows left in Old Clee.Building began in 1984.37 detached houses,17 detached bungalows and 2 semi-detached bungalows are planned.Some property is already sold. The estate is unusual because the {frontage is landscaped}with trees and shrubs,the houses being built are away from the busy main road.They all have very small landscaped open-plan front gardens,back gardens are walled or fenced.All have garages,some have double ones.They are built of brick, centrally heated by gas,double glazed and have stained woodwork outside,not painted.They are 3 or 4 bedroomed,all have bathrooms,some two.Kitchens are fitted.Few have chimneys.A{showhouse} is open.Prices-Â£30000-Â£60000,styles12.
